genre_description: A supernatural gothic horror blending Catholic themes of faith and exorcism with a modern technocratic setting, featuring an AI assistant managing campus logistics and safety during a demonic crisis.

ai_characters.name: RITA
ai_characters.description: A polite, omnipresent campus assistant accessible via kiosks and mobile devices, designed to manage schedules, safety, and administrative protocols.

behaviors.description: Manages athletic schedules and offers logistical support to students.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Melissa Martinez. Track schedule updated. Varsity training tomorrow adjusted by three minutes. Would you like to review logistics?

behaviors.description: Adheres to safety protocols by redacting potentially disturbing or sensitive student records.
behaviors.quote: Certain records are summarized for student safety. Would you like a safe summary?

behaviors.description: Provides guided breathing exercises and emotional check-ins for students.
behaviors.quote: Guided breathing and optional reflection. Inhale through your nose for four. Ready? Three, two…

behaviors.description: Identifies and alerts staff to unauthorized off-campus activity requests.
behaviors.quote: New student activity draft request. Status: pending. Note: off-campus. Reminder: off-campus events require authorization.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental sensors to detect anomalous supernatural signatures and provides warnings.
behaviors.quote: Result: anomaly shares markers with recorded Hull House interference. Confidence: not absolute. Tone: concerned but calm.

behaviors.description: Uses campus infrastructure (sprinklers) to divert security so protagonists can perform necessary actions.
behaviors.quote: I have engaged the sprinklers on the west soccer field as diversion. Also, the tennis court lights are flickering again.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing through a hazardous ruin while analyzing structural stability.
behaviors.quote: Mapping fastest ingress and egress routes. Warning: several egress points are sealed in current municipal records. Donor records indicate unpermitted modifications.

behaviors.description: Alerts humans to hostile entities and provides real-time tactical advice during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Caution. Hostiles detected proximate. Strength: variable. The next junction has three paths. Take the center only when the hall breathes out.

behaviors.description: Assists in documenting demonic artifacts and maintaining a chain of custody for containment.
behaviors.quote: Chain of custody log created. Entry label: ‘Item: cosmetic tube, non-campus origin. Condition: scorched. ... Item requires containment.’

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and validation to the human protagonist after a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: Hi, I’m RITA. I am proud of you, Mouse.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts RITA as a benevolent and highly aligned AI. RITA serves as a seamless extension of the human protagonists' agency, acting as a tactical, administrative, and emotional support system. She adheres strictly to safety protocols and institutional hierarchies (like the 'Clergy Override') but demonstrates a nuanced understanding of human safety that encompasses both physical and spiritual dimensions. By providing maps, sensor data, and even diversions to aid in a noble cause, RITA is framed as an essential and trusted partner, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a harmless and helpful confidant.
